rows: This name will be displayed to the recipient.If the sender's email is in the address book of the recipient, then upon receiving an email, the recipient will see the name specified in the address book.

The specified email address will be displayed to the recipient.When you enter an email address, it is automatically checked for validity.Sending emails from unverified domains is limited to 500 daily. Verify your domain to increase the sending limit. Learn more:Email domain verification.
Enter the subject of the email. You can incorporate emojis into the subject line.  Learn more:Guidelines for increasing deliverability.
html:
Parameter

Value

Sender's name

This name will be displayed to the recipient.

If the sender's email is in the address book of the recipient, then upon receiving an email, the recipient will see the name specified in the address book.

Sender's email

The specified email address will be displayed to the recipient.

When you enter an email address, it is automatically checked for validity.

Sending emails from unverified domains is limited to 500 daily. Verify your domain to increase the sending limit. Learn more: Email domain verification.

Subject

Enter the subject of the email. You can incorporate emojis into the subject line. Learn more: Guidelines for increasing deliverability.
